casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marvin Louis MILLER, Jr. 268P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2018 Leslie C. Rawls, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Miller, Marvin Louis (Jr.)

James D. Concepcion, Assistant Attorney General, Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina *210The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of August 2018."
